pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api

Interface ConfigurationAware

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ActionParameterExtractor<T>, DataController, SerializationEngine<T>, SerializationResolver<T>, ServerEngine, ServletServerEngine
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractServerEngine, ActionController, AuthenticationInterceptor, BristleSerializationResolver, JsonSerializationEngine, PlainObjectParameterExtractor, UserContextExtractor, UserDetailsParameterExtractor

    public interface ConfigurationAware
    This marker interface indicates that given implementing component (or extending interface) requires Bristleback configuration.

    Created on: 2011-09-18 16:13:31

    Author:
    Wojciech Niemiec
